thread.title: Thoongavam audio on October 7
thread.title_full: Thoongavam audio on October 7 - The Times of India

author: timesofindia.indiatimes.com
title: Thoongavam audio on October 7
text:
There's good news for Ulaganayagan Kamal Haasan fans. The audio launch of the actor's upcoming film Thoonga Vanam is all set to release at a multiplex in Chennai. The post on the actor's social networking page stated, "‪#‎Thoongaavanam Song & Trailer release on 7th October, 9am at Sathyam Cinemas".
The film has music by Ghibran, who has now become a regular feature in the actor's films. Thoongavanam is directed by Rajesh M Selva, a former assistant of the actor. The film has Trisha playing the female lead and is expected to hit screens for Diwali.
